name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-custom-action-manager
title: SharePoint Custom Action Manager
shortDescription: The SharePoint Custom Action Manager is a comprehensive, enterprise-grade SharePoint Framework (SPFx) web part for managing SharePoint custom actions with advanced features including bulk operations, role-based access control, template gallery, and advanced search capabilities.
longDescription: The SharePoint Custom Action Manager is a comprehensive, enterprise-grade SharePoint Framework (SPFx) web part for managing SharePoint custom actions with advanced features including bulk operations, role-based access control, template gallery, and advanced search capabilities.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
